title: Natural Traditional Bifold Wallet
description: Our handmade Traditional Bifold is our take on a true American classic. It's the kind of wallet your grandfather carried for decades, finally slimmed up and done with a special C&C touch. Contains a traditional slot for cash and plenty of room for all of your cards.Premium Horween full-grain leather and robust stit
cleaned_text: Returns Policy We offer exchanges and/or returns on any unused, non-monogrammed products. If the issue pertains to a belt size we are happy to offer that exchange free of charge. We'll also pay the return shipping costs if the return is a result of our error. Shipping We can ship to virtually any address in the world. Note that there are restrictions on some products, and some products cannot be shipped to international destinations. When you place an order, we will estimate shipping and delivery dates for you based on the availability of your items and the shipping options you choose. Depending on the shipping provider you choose, shipping date estimates may appear on the shipping quotes page. Please also note that the shipping rates for many items we sell are weight-based. The weight of any such item can be found on its detail page. To reflect the policies of the shipping companies we use, all weights will be rounded up to the next full pound.
